characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Words of Radiance (mentioned)

characterDescription: Brightness Davar was the first wife of Brightlord Lin Davar and Shallan's birth mother. She died before her husband, who was later remarried to Malise Gevelmar.

characterDetails.History: Suspected to be a member of the Ghostbloods, Shallan's mother and a friend attempted to kill Shallan once they'd learned of her potential abilities. When attacked, Shallan, having already spoken Radiant ideals, summoned her Shardblade and killed her mother with it. Thereafter, Shallan's father pretended to have killed his wife to protect Shallan from further 'assassination attempts'.  Shallan lost/blocked all memory of this event and only regained it near the end of Words of Radiance.[citation needed]
